title: Basic
description: This schema defines basic common types that are used by other schemas.

uuid.description: Unique id used to identify an entity.

email.description: Email address of a user or other entities.

entityLink.description: Link to an entity or field of an entity of format `<#E/{enties}/{entityName}/{field}/{fieldValue}`.

href.description: href that points to a resource.

duration.description: Duration in ISO 8601 format in UTC time. Example - 'P23DT23H'.

date.description: Date in ISO 8601 format in UTC time. Example - '2018-11-13'.

dateTime.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Example - '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00'.
